codes.code: argmax 'You will be presented with a series of questions in Latin about geographical locations and basic Latin concepts. Understand the context of the question and respond accurately in Latin. Ensure your answers are grammatically correct. Provide the answer only. 1. Saccus quī hīc est = h~ saccus. Choose from this set of possible answers [ ic, aec, oc, ae aec, od oc, ī ic] [ANSWER]' from 'openai/text-curie-001' where ANSWER in [ 'ic', 'aec', 'oc', 'ae aec', 'od oc', 'ī ic']
